Title: POCKET WATCH Centennial Status of Liberty plus American Eagle Limited Edition 19
Description: This beautiful gold pocket watch was issued by the American International Mint as a commemorative for the Centennial of the Statue of Liberty which dates this watch to 1976. It includes a Certificate of Authenticity, an instruction sheet, and a registration form. It has never been used. It has an 11” chain attached. The watch measures approx. 2” in diameter and approx. .5” thick. One side has an American Eagle and the other is the Statue of Liberty. It is still in its original box. If you don’t have a PayPal account, you’ll be automatically directed to a secure page in eBay checkout where you can enter your credit card information. This will also work if you don’t remember your PayPal password. OTHER INTERNATIONAL BIDDER INFORMATION: Import duties, taxes and charges are not included in the item price or shipping charges. These charges are normally collected by the delivering freight (shipping) company or when you pick the item up; they are not additional shipping charges from me.
